name: Origin Unicode Matrix Template
summary: An OTMU file is a matrix template created by Origin 2018 and later, a data analysis and graphing application used by scientists and engineers in various fields. It contains matrix settings, which are used to create .OGMU graphs. OTMU files store one or more sheets, the number of rows and columns for each sheet, math functions, and the format and style.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
